title: Band
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in double running stitch on plain weave, with needle lace edging
description: Panel made by piecing together two ends of an embroidered towel. The smaller pattern is of a curving vine and pomegranate; the larger pattern has a curving vine and fruiting plant. Embroidered in red on an off-white ground, with red and white lace edging at top and bottom.
name: Band
